name: Kobold, Planes Hunter
description: The Kobold Planes Hunter is a small humanoid creature known for its cunning combat style and magical attacks, wielding a longsword and exhibiting a mastery of elemental damage.
memorable: Its ability to choose resistances and deal substantial damage makes it a formidable opponent.
goals: To track and eliminate threats from other planes while utilizing its magical abilities in combat.
relations: Typically encountered with other kobolds or creatures from elemental planes.
environment: Commonly found in environments linked to various planes of existence.
strengths: Has enhanced abilities against Celestials, Fiends, and Elementals, ensuring tactical advantages.
weaknesses: Sunlight sensitivity causes disadvantage on certain checks and attacks in bright light.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with longsword strikes, deals damage enhanced by elemental energy.
most_powerful_ability: Warping Whirlwind unleashes devastating area damage while allowing it to manipulate reality.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 16, granting it the ability to detect hidden threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in tracking and perceiving threats, particularly against creatures linked to other planes.
additional_information: Can teleport using Planar Step for mobility.
Gains advantage on attacks when allies are nearby via Pack Tactics.
Can resist specific elemental damage types with Planar Attunement.
Critical hits immobilize foes from extradimensional movement.
Can shift to another plane of existence once per day.
test_queries: agile small humanoid that hunts planes
kobold with attack advantages when flanking
